update user

nameId = #{nameId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
